long_description: Tame those pesky webbing ends with the Strap Tender by Gear Aid. Includes a split buckle that attaches to 1 in. webbing, and a shockcord loop that secures the loose webbing. Shockcord locks tight in the buckle and releases quickly for adjustments on the trail. Also fits 3/4 in. webbing.
short_description: Tame those pesky webbing ends with the Strap Tender by Gear Aid. Includes a split buckle that attaches to 1 in. webbing, and a shockcord loop that secures the loose webbing.
